name: Shield of Faith

components.materialDescription: a small piece of parchment with a bit of holy text written on it

description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

effects.special: Target gains a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

engineHook.notes: Applies a temporary +2 AC bonus to the target character's AC stat.
